column3: Latest; Battambang: A preliminary report of the police said that a foreigner died  at 8:00 pm on April 9
column6: Battambang city.------The report said that the victim
column9: lived with his Khmer wife Phan Saray
column11: at the scene.------The victim was said to have had a chronic physical condition that seriously affected his kidneys.------According to the authorities
column12: after checking and clarifying  with the family
column13: they concluded the victim died from a serious illness.
